meanings.definition: A cold, frothy drink made with ice cream, milk, and flavoring.
meanings.sent1: I love to sip on frappes during hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The cafe down the street serves delicious frappes.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted a taste of the frappes.
meanings.sent4: The frappes at the new shop were like a sweet, creamy dream.
meanings.sent5: The frappes were so refreshing, they instantly cooled me down.

meanings.definition: To strike with a whip or stick.
meanings.sent1: The cowboy frappes the horse to make it run faster.
meanings.sent2: She frappes the rug to get rid of the dust.
meanings.sent3: In the movie, the hero frappes the villain with a mighty blow.
meanings.sent4: The storm frappes the trees, bending them with its force.
meanings.sent5: The boxer frappes his opponent with a powerful punch.

meanings.definition: To blend or mix ingredients in a rapid motion.
meanings.sent1: She frappes the smoothie ingredients in the blender.
meanings.sent2: The chef frappes the sauce to create a creamy texture.
meanings.sent3: The kids love to frappes the cake batter together.
meanings.sent4: The whirlwind frappes the leaves into a swirling dance.
meanings.sent5: The DJ frappes the music tracks seamlessly for a perfect mix.
